price: 84. Ee ha u samir waayin, waxaan uun u tirinaynaa tiro13 (maalmo go’an).
arabic: فَلَا تَعۡجَلۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ إِنَّمَا نَعُدُّ لَهُمۡ عَدّٗا
footnotes: 13. Waxaan u tirinnaa neefahiisa uu neefsado, iyo maalmahiisa, ama camalladiisa xun.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: falā taʿjal ʿalayhim innamā naʿuddu lahum ʿaddan
